channel.title: BLACK MESA ON ROOSTERTEETH!
channel.description:
[url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=C4eEiLKwKuQ&feature=plcp[/url]
This guarantees BM will break download records of any mod, ever.

item.title: BLACK MESA ON ROOSTERTEETH!
item.dc:creator: UnhingedMouse0
item.description:
I commented correcting them on a bunch of things and my comment got 200 thumbs up… why didn’t make top comment? Because YouTube is buggy as hell and Google doesn’t give a crap.

It was funny though, some loser replied to my comment with:
“This is not a﻿ fact video this is just them talking about a game. chill the fuck out and stop bitching.”

Funny part is, he was the only one actually bitching about anything. Oh stupid people, gotta love em. :jizz:

Read full topic

item.title: BLACK MESA ON ROOSTERTEETH!
item.dc:creator: metalmunki
item.description:
Eion Kilant 739:

According to a few posts on the comments section the word about the mod is still spreading.

I, too am really annoyed that they said you needed Half-Life 2. Unfortunately the top comments are both bashing a stupid post. Looking down the line there are comments with WAAAY higher votes. If I had a youtube account I think I’d rate most of the top comments down and as spam on the majority of videos.
This is just silly.

Well once its on steam proper, it probably wont require the SDK. It’ll be packaged up legit. So no long-term harm done.

Read full topic

item.title: BLACK MESA ON ROOSTERTEETH!
item.dc:creator: PlausibleSarge
item.description:
Eion Kilant 739:

According to a few posts on the comments section the word about the mod is still spreading.

I, too am really annoyed that they said you needed Half-Life 2. Unfortunately the top comments are both bashing a stupid post. Looking down the line there are comments with WAAAY higher votes. If I had a youtube account I think I’d rate most of the top comments down and as spam on the majority of videos.
This is just silly.

You must be new to Youtube. The first rule is, ALWAYS avoid the comments sections. There is literally nothing worse. I can go to a special ed class and have more engaging conversations with the students than I can on youtube.

Read full topic

item.title: BLACK MESA ON ROOSTERTEETH!
item.dc:creator: Executor
item.description:
UnhingedMouse0:

Well the main site got over a million hits within the first two days since release, I’d say it’s probably already way past breaking records.

Another fun statistic: Right now the torrent is showing me about 15,000 seeds, a tiny fraction of all those who downloaded it that way. :jizz:

Yeah, I don’t know about anyone else, but I quit seeding when my ratio got over 10. I figured that was more than enough.

Read full topic

item.title: BLACK MESA ON ROOSTERTEETH!
item.dc:creator: UnhingedMouse0
item.description:
Two things I’ve become an expert at on YouTube

a. Getting top comments. There is actually somewhat of a working strategy to this.

…and when I get bored…

b. Trolling people. It’s so incredibly easy. :jizz:
